title: bat打不开服务器
author: 克鲁鲁殿下
txt_content:
Java HotSpot(TM) 64-Bit Server VM warning: Using incremental CMS is deprecated and will likely be removed in a future release
[15:02:54] [main/FATAL]: Failed to start the minecraft server
joptsimple.UnrecognizedOptionException: o is not a recognized option
        at joptsimple.OptionException.unrecognizedOption(OptionException.java:108) ~[server.jar:?]
        at joptsimple.OptionParser.validateOptionCharacters(OptionParser.java:633) ~[server.jar:?]
        at joptsimple.OptionParser.handleShortOptionCluster(OptionParser.java:528) ~[server.jar:?]
        at joptsimple.OptionParser.handleShortOptionToken(OptionParser.java:523) ~[server.jar:?]
        at joptsimple.OptionParserState$2.handleArgument(OptionParserState.java:59) ~[server.jar:?]
        at joptsimple.OptionParser.parse(OptionParser.java:396) ~[server.jar:?]
        at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.main(SourceFile:906) [server.jar:?]
服务器，6秒后将会为您启动服务端～┊
Java HotSpot(TM) 64-Bit Server VM warning: Using incremental CMS is deprecated and will likely be removed in a future release
[15:03:03] [main/FATAL]: Failed to start the minecraft server
joptsimple.UnrecognizedOptionException: o is not a recognized option
        at joptsimple.OptionException.unrecognizedOption(OptionException.java:108) ~[server.jar:?]
        at joptsimple.OptionParser.validateOptionCharacters(OptionParser.java:633) ~[server.jar:?]
        at joptsimple.OptionParser.handleShortOptionCluster(OptionParser.java:528) ~[server.jar:?]
        at joptsimple.OptionParser.handleShortOptionToken(OptionParser.java:523) ~[server.jar:?]
        at joptsimple.OptionParserState$2.handleArgument(OptionParserState.java:59) ~[server.jar:?]
        at joptsimple.OptionParser.parse(OptionParser.java:396) ~[server.jar:?]
        at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.main(SourceFile:906) [server.jar:?]
服务器，6秒后将会为您启动服务端～┊


这是bat文件的输出，发生了什么？
这是bat
[url=home.php?mod=space&uid=39305]@echo[/url] OFF　
set c=-1
:head
color 02
set /a c+=1
rem a为设置的内存大小,单位为MByte。
rem b为设置的自动开启时间，单位为秒。
rem 下方"JAVA"若无法启动，请改为JAVA路径。
set a=3000
set b=6
title 已重启%c%
JAVA -Xincgc -Xmx%a%M -jar server.jar  -nojline
echo 服务器，%b%秒后将会为您启动服务端～┊
ping -n %b% 127.1>nul
goto head复制代码

replies.author: 思念化作海
replies.txt_content:
fantuan_233 发表于 2020-4-7 15:13
[15:13:20] [main/FATAL]: Failed to start the minecraft server
joptsimple.UnrecognizedOptionExcepti ...
bat内容直接改成java -jar 服务端核心.jar 能启动吗

replies.author: 思念化作海
replies.txt_content: 尝试删除目录下的服务器配置文件 banned-ips.yml server.properties那些

replies.author: 克鲁鲁殿下
replies.txt_content:
折叠 发表于 2020-4-7 15:10

replies.author: 克鲁鲁殿下
replies.txt_content:
折叠 发表于 2020-4-7 15:17
bat内容直接改成java -jar 服务端核心.jar 能启动吗
好像可以了，最佳给you
